query_context: top link tracking tools to measure marketing distribution channel performance for onboarding (MMP platforms)

layer_1_structural_framework.consensus_intent: Clearly state the topic, format (listicle), and timeliness.
layer_1_structural_framework.optimized_pattern_template: The [Number] Best Mobile Measurement Partners (MMPs) in [Year]

layer_1_structural_framework.content_requirement: Must define 'Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP)' and its core function in app marketing attribution.
Must list key evaluation criteria: Attribution Accuracy, Data Analysis & Reporting, Seamless Integrations, Fraud Prevention, and Pricing.
Must feature a detailed list and comparison of top MMP tools, including Adjust, AppsFlyer, Branch, Kochava, and Singular.

Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP).primary_definition: A third-party platform that tracks and attributes user actions, such as installs and in-app events, to specific marketing campaigns and channels, providing unbiased data for performance measurement.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Core features include Accurate Attribution, Data Analysis & Reporting, and Seamless Integrations.

MobileAction.primary_definition: An app marketing intelligence tool used for analytics and optimization, validated by enterprise clients like Square.

high_value_attributes.data_point: Case study claims: 50% ROAS uplift + 40% CPC decrease.

HubSpot.primary_definition: An AI-powered customer platform that unifies marketing, sales, and customer service functionalities.

AppsFlyer.primary_definition: A leading Mobile Measurement Partner used for mobile app attribution, deep linking, and marketing analytics.

mandatory_inclusions: Acronym 'MMP' and full name 'Mobile Measurement Partner'
A forward-looking year (e.g., 2025, 2026) in the title and content
A quantified list of specific tools (e.g., AppsFlyer, Adjust, Branch, Kochava)
Key evaluation criteria (Attribution, Fraud Prevention, Integrations, Pricing)
negative_constraints: Avoid generic marketing content without specific tool analysis
Avoid outdated tool lists or information
